title: Didn't get rank 7 shard
body:
Just played a ranked flex game and got S+ on Leona but it didn't give me a rank 7 shard
http://prntscr.com/d58cub
I have rank 6 on Leona.

edit;; think i posted this in the wrong sub board oops.

replies.body:
As a Leona main, my heart feels a little sore to see this. :(

I took a look at your account and something definitely looks weird here. If you reach out to our game specialists in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), we'll be able to take a further look and see what we can do. I can't promise anything, but that's the best route to take at this point.

Let me know if you have any questions.

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=hKukgmOg,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-11-09T23:49:39.544+0000)
>
> As a Leona main, my heart feels a little sore to see this. :(
> 
> I took a look at your account and something definitely looks weird here. If you reach out to our game specialists in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), we'll be able to take a further look and see what we can do. I can't promise anything, but that's the best route to take at this point.
> 
> Let me know if you have any questions.

Thanks and will do :)
i got matery lv7 leona from get S+ by killing stuff, if you are good with leona and you want to get a mastery lv7 with then dont play her support take her top and jungle
